SWIM: Scenario Weights for Importance Measurement Silvana M. Pesenti University of Torontosilvana.pesenti@utoronto.ca Alberto Bettini Pietro Millossovich DEAMS, University of Trieste Cass Business School, City, University of LondonAndreas Tsanakas Cass Business School, City, University of London28 August 2019 1 Overview The SWIM package provides weights on simulated scenarios from a stochastic model, such that stressed model components (random variables) fulfil given probabilistic constraints (e.g. specified values for risk measures), under the new scenario weights. Scenario weights are selected by constrained minimisation of the relative entropy to the baseline model. The SWIM package is based on Pesenti, Millossovich, and Tsanakas (2019). 1.1 Installation The SWIM package can be install from CRAN : https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=SWIM; alternatively from GitHub in R studio: install.packages("spesenti/SWIM") References
